subject: Football
Interscholastic Athletics
lead_paragraph: On Thanksgiving morning, 90-year-old Harold Bellis, on the same field where he saw his first Easton-Phillipsburg high school football game, plans to watch their 100th meeting.
snippet: On Thanksgiving morning, 90-year-old Harold Bellis, on the same field where he saw his first Easton-Phillipsburg high school football game, plans to watch their 100th meeting.
